Experience Our Gallery

Imbayedu Art Collective is more than just an online platform. Visit our physical gallery space to experience the full impact of these exceptional artworks in person. Our knowledgeable staff is available to guide you through our collections and help you find the perfect piece for your space.

Gallery Hours

  • Monday - Friday10:00 AM - 6:00 PM
  • Saturday11:00 AM - 5:00 PM
  • SundayClosed
Plan Your Visit

Upcoming Exhibitions

Visit our exhibitions to experience African art in person and meet our talented artists

Contemporary African Expressions

June 15-30, 2024
10:00 AM - 6:00 PM
National Gallery of Zimbabwe, Harare
20 Julius Nyerere Way, Harare
Entry Fee: $10
Featured Artists:
Zinhle Mkhize, Koffi Adama, Thabo Mbeki

A showcase of emerging contemporary African artists exploring themes of identity and culture.

Note: Opening reception on June 15th at 6:00 PM

Urban African Art Festival

July 10-20, 2024
11:00 AM - 7:00 PM
Bulawayo Art Gallery
95 Main Street, Bulawayo
Entry Fee: $15
Featured Artists:
O'Neal Tanaka Maisiri, Thabo Mbeki, Zinhle Mkhize

Exhibition featuring urban contemporary artworks from Zimbabwe's leading artists.

Note: Live art demonstrations every weekend

Traditional Meets Modern

August 5-15, 2024
10:00 AM - 5:00 PM
Marondera Arts Center
45 The Green, Marondera
Entry Fee: $8
Featured Artists:
Koffi Adama, O'Neal Tanaka Maisiri

A unique exhibition bridging traditional African art forms with contemporary expressions.

Note: Artist talks every Wednesday at 2:00 PM
